Поиграть в BioShock Infinite мне удалось через некорое время после релиза. Игру довольно тепло встретила игровая пресса. Поэтому я ожидал довольно много от данной игры. Скажу сразу, мои ожидания в основном оправдались. В BioShock Infinite мног положительных моментов, но также в ней присуствуют недостатки которые меня просто вымораживают. Во-первых, это довольно  вольное обращение с сюжетом (затыкание сюжетных дыр при помощи разрывов). На мой звгляд, лучше бы они оставили концепцию разрывов из ранних наработок. Во-вторых, это когда меня заставляют делать одно и тоже несколько раз. Ну и на последок стоит отметить довольно низкую сложность игры. Игра не представляет сложности за исключением нескольких моментов. Если бы не вышеперечисленные моменты игре можно былобы поставить оценку отлично, но к сожалению она дотягивает только до хорошо.

un gioco fantasy e alternativo come poi tutta la saga di bioshock, la trama molto ben struturata e con un gameplay molto fluido per la grafica non troppo pesante, le scene di combatimento sono molto ben struturate e divertenti grazie ai vigor (poteri ) e alle  variazione delle armi, e alla inovazione delle skyline che e diventato molto più semplice spostarsi da un posto all'altro.

parere personale : 
a me e piaciuto molto più dei altri due titoli, e lo consiglio perchè e molto divertente con una trama molto bella e per i combattimenti .

Not recommended.

On-rails shooter boring as hell.
99% of the enemies are humans which can be killed with a headshot fairly easy.

I think the game has a decent ammount of guns...I guess...since I always used the pistol you get in the beginning and a rifle...really, that's all you need. Just stay at medium/long distances and start scoring headshots.

The powers you get (which I already forgot how they are called) are totally unnecessary due to reasons above.
The plot of the game includes alternate dimenssions, which means that is all a clusterfuck that does not make any sense in the end (after finishing the game, the first thing you do will be googling the ending's meaning)

Also, VERY short game. Ended it in about 10 hours or less, even though it was my first time playing it.
Simplesmente, FODA.
great game you should buy it if you where a fan of the original bioshock buy it ive finished this game so many times
Excellent graphics, amazing story, and many side things to look for throughout the game to keep you intrigued.

As the major Bioshock-fangirl I am, I was so happy over this third installment of the game series. Even though Infinite seperates quite a lot from the two earlier games, it still has it's similarities. The story is well written and the graphics are amazing! Infinite doesn't have the same creepy feeling as Bioshock 1 & 2, but it still doesn't disappoint and there are even some small jumpscares included in the game. Also loving the fact that you can have all the different vigors at once, as to in the earlier Bioshock there was a limit of 2 plasmids unless you bought more. 5/5 rating from me!

11 из 10 Великолепнейшее творение!

Thanks to a mix of steam crashes, glitches, and other fun things like having the entire game delete itself when it first finished downloading, it took me almost two full weeks before I finally got this game installed on my PC. I'm not sure it if was my zombie PC or Steam being a jerk, but it was probably the worst experience i've ever had installing something on a computer in my entire life. And that's really saying something considering how long i've been playing games.

When I finally got to playing the game however... it was pretty much the opposite experience of what installing it was like: I couldn't get enough of it. Before too long, I found that about 12 hours had passed and I had finished the whole game... in one sitting. And yet I could have kept going if the game was longer. Whether that is a testament to the game's ability to suck me in and keep my interest, or proof of my insanity, is uncertain. I'm thinking both.

I was not a fan of Bioshock 1 (I thought it was just ok), and Bioshock 2 was just bad in pretty much all aspects. I wasn't expecting to like this as much as I did. And yet that is how things turned out. The only bad things I can say about this game is that the final boss fight is lame and that when I eventually go achievement hunting finding all those damn audio recordings is going to be a pain.*

Anyway, this is a yummy one. Have fun! :D

*It was. At least there were guides for it all.
Not really infinite. Mis-selling right there. Apart from that, decent FPS, great story.

[b]Para análise em português, leia mais abaixo.[/b]

[i]Bioshock Infinite - Review: The Garden of Eden and the Apple of Sin[/i]

From an acclaimed franchise, Infinite had a difficult task for the series: Bring new breath to the Bioshock universe, without lose the characteristics that have made fans in the decaying underwater city of Rapture.
Infinite leaves the deep water to travel to the skies. Columbia, 1912. An utopia floating in the heavens. A city of peace and harmony as mankind has never seen before. The new Eden, free from sins.

And then, it all fell apart. Behind the masks of the holy city, political, religious, philosophical and scientific conflicts corrode that self imposed image. Nothing is what it seems. You're Booker DeWitt, sent to Columbia to rescue the young Elisabeth, held captive since an early age. What secrets the city hides? How important is the girl? And who is she?

With a wonderful ambientation, a steampunk reality of the 20s, mixing the culture of this time with a strangely advanced technology. The soundtrack perfectly composes the plot as you cross several different and well made scenarios​​. You can really feel yourself in that place.

Open your mind, prepare your heart and come see all the beauties and obscurities of Columbia.

[i]Bioshock Infinite - Análise: O Jardim do Éden e a Maçã do Pecado[/i]

Partindo de uma franquia aclamada, Infinite possuía uma difícil missão para a série: Trazer novo fôlego ao universo de Bioshock, sem perder as características que conquistaram os fãs na decadente cidade submarina de Rapture.
Infinite abandona as águas profundas para viajar a céu aberto. Columbia, 1912. Uma utopia flutuando nos céus. Uma cidade de paz e harmonia como a humanidade jamais vira antes. O novo Éden, livre de pecados.

E então, tudo desabou. Por trás das máscaras da santa cidade, conflitos políticos, religiosos, filosóficos e científicos corróem esta imagem que se impõe. Nada é o que parece. Você é Booker DeWitt, enviado a Columbia para resgatar a jovem Elisabeth, mantida em cativeiro desde tenra idade. Quais segredos escondem a cidade? Qual a importância da menina? E quem é ela?

Com uma ambientação maravilhosa, uma realidade steampunk dos anos 20 mistura a cultura da época com uma tecnologia estranhamente avançada. A trilha sonora compõe perfeitamente a trama, enquanto vocês cruza diversos cenários diferentes e bem feitos. É possível realmente se sentir no local.

Abra sua mente, prepare seu coração e venha conhecer todas as belezas e obscuridades de Columbia.

Whew, that's it, I finally put in the time and beat Bioshock Infinite, This is probably the best game I've ever played. It takes you out of your world, makes political statements, comments on religion, pop culture, violence, and technology. And it's just packed with little gems like this:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yHRFZU7Yd_M

This game is good looking, well polished game. But it's not a good game. Story sucks and has a lot of plot holes, action mechanics behind first 2 games, vigors("plasmids") has no use in story or general game world and vigor tipes sucks too. No puzzles, no side quests, no exploration, no hacking something, no hiding from someone... only kill, kill, kill and more and more kill.  

 Game not let you have your own decision or anything. it's just yell at you: "your decisions doesn't matter att all, you will do same things all over again and again and again and again and..." and you have to live with that. and that sucks. because game devolopers knows that actually decisions we make have a lot of meanings and they will lead to a lot of diffrent paths in story but they are too lazy to make some complex and awesome game. So they made this. 

 Tiers are good idea but in game they are useless and stupid. İn story you only use it twice(for stupid reasons) and you don't get chance to choose about using tier or not. Because why? "Because you allways make the same decisions! Over all again and again and again and..." 

 İt's sucks, it's lame and this game is wasted a good idea, good world and everyting that bioshock's name ever had in my mind. 

 for more you can watch this (not my video but it's just explained everthing very well.): http://youtu.be/VdNhwb7iuI4

You will meet a colorful cast of unique characters with interesting and well-hidden backstories. You will be completely engrossed in the beauty of stylish, yet also gorgeously detailed, art design and graphics. And amongst all of this beauty, you will also shoot people. Tons of people. Hundreds, if not thousands of souls will meet their maker because Booker DeWitt is an invinceble Superman whose only weakness is Cutscene Land, the magical realm where his healing and magic abilities are wrestled away from him. Speaking of which, Booker finds assorted Plasmids (in this game called "Vigors") which function exactly the same as the Plasmids from previous Bioshocks, only here they seem to have caused no deformities in anyone whatsoever. So I guess Andrew Ryan and his scientists just didn't try hard enough over in their parallel universe. It's okay, it's not like the effects of Plasmids on the human mind and body was a central aspect of the series' story.

In short, great game with boring combat that makes no sense.

Bioshock Infinite:  Ein Spiel, dass mit einer packenden Hauptstory, ausgefallener Kampfhandlung und Liebe fürs Detail punktet!

Nach den, in der finsteren Unterwasserstadt Rapture spielenden, Vorgängern  bringen die Entwickler ein komplett anderes Szenario in die Reihe. Columbia - die Stadt in den Wolken hat mich seit beginn des Spieles gefesselt. Ich konnte mich nicht satt sehen. 
Trotz der hellen Lichteffekte und verspielten Kulissen, schwingen manche unheimlichen Stellen mit und verursachen so die perfekte Mischung. 
Auch Storyliebhabern bietet Bioshock Infinite mehr als genug! Spoilern möchte ich nicht, aber am Ende des Spiels sitz Ihr garantiert mit offenem Mund vor dem Bildschirm.
Ein  Punkt ist für meine Zuneigung zum Spiel ebenfalls, die alte rauschende 20er Jahre-Musik aus dem Plattenspieler, wie sie auch in den vorherigen Bioshock-Teilen zu finden ist.

Ein kleiner Minuspunkt könnte sein, dass man mehr oder weniger durch die Story gezogen wird und wenig Freiraum für eigene Handlungen hat. Aber durch die Unmengen an Gegnern erscheint auch dieser Aspekt mir als Unlangweilig ;)

Viel Spaß beim Spielen

Das soll ein Shooter sein? Seit über einer halben Stunde halte ich keine Waffe in der Hand – und war darüber noch nie so froh wie hier: Mit einer Mischung aus Faszination und Neugierde wandere ich durch ein scheinbares Paradies hoch über den Wolken.

Einfach gesagt BRILLIANT. Ich habe noch nie ein Spiel mit so viel Emotion und Hintergrund gesehen. So viel unerwartetes und eine Geschichte, die einem zum nachdenken bringt. Atemberaubende Szenen, nicht nur ein Spiel, sondern ein Kunstwerk.

Это красиво.Это невероятно.Это волшебно.
Главный герой-Букер Девитт,ветеран американской кавалерии,принимает участие в неком эксперименте,в ходе которого он попадает в воздушный город Колумбия.Он должен спасти из башни-тюрьмы девушку Элизабет и раскрыть покрытую мглой тайну Колумбии... Этот райский город ( который еще называют Раем ) когда-то был восьмым штатом США и находился на земле.Но правителя Колумбии Комстока изгнали из США политики из Вашингтона.Комсток был готов к этому,и переместил свой город в небо на 15 тысяч футов ( Фут-30,48 сантиметров ).Теперь туда могут попасть только избранные... Букеру приходит телеграмма,в которой ему приказано опасаться чисел "77".Но Букер не обращает на это пиьсьмо внимания и в ходе одной лотерии он становится преступником в Колумбии...

This game = the main Cheese

Please note that I haven't played any DLC. I'm just reviewing the base game, though I may edit this review once I have played all the DLC.

BioShock Infinite a good game, it just doesn't live up to the original.

Story:
Like every bioshock game, the story is amazing. I don't want to spoil it, so I'm just gonna say that it's worth playing multiple times to find certain entities you may have not noticed in your first playthrough.

Graphics:
Beautiful, not really anything else to say.

Gameplay:
I'm kind of on the fence with this one.
Compared to the original, weapons seem rather generic. This would be fine if it was a stand-alone game, but since the original's gameplay is so geniune, I feel like infinite's gameplay is a step backwards in the series. I don't feel that there is a significant amount of strategy involved in this game compared to the others. I also was dissapointed to find that there were no multiple endings like in the previous games, but that doesn't really take away from the game as a whole.

Characters:
Every character has a story that you want to dive deeper into; even more so once you complete the game. The only problem I have is that the main character sort of thinks and talks for you. This is just my opinion, but I feel that it takes away from the immersion as you are rather forced to bare this person's thoughts and opinions against your own. The fact that the decisions you do make have little to no impact doesn't help. In the earlier games, I felt that the choices I made were because of my own independent reasons. That doesn't mean that the main character isn't interesting, it's just a different formula.

Overall, I'd give this game an 8/10. If it were on its own without any expectations to live up to, I might give it a 9 or even a 10. However, that is not the case.

УБЬЮ ЗА ЭЛИЗАБЕТ ВЫЙДУ НАДАЮ ПЕСДЮЛЕЙ Выбегает вонючий зодрот из хаты ЛАМПОВАЯ НЯША АНЯНЯНЯНЯНЯНЯ ЛАМПИТСЯ ПОД ЛАМПОЙ ЛАМПА УБИТЬ ЗА БОГИНЮ Лютесы такие в ахуи стоят. Зодрот такой поднимает дряблую рученку для удара и легонько толкает Роберта. Лютес-тня с блятской рожой МИМО А вот кстати, когда Лютесы девчонку забрали, то им было на неё похуё. Ну вот вообще похуё, она до 5 лет сролась под себя и её подмывали спидозные ниггиры. Я еще тогда Роберта спросил "А че так так-то оно норм?". А он мне такой А МНЕ ПОХУЁ. Я тогда еще расстроился и зашел к маленькой Элизабет, а она говним стены мазала и ибало все в говни было. А Розалин все ходила и орала МИМО. Я вот еще разок к ним заглянул, ну тогда еще Лютесы дохлые были, но им было похуё. И вот захожу я значит в башню, а девочка уже подросла. Её Камсток в школу отправил, чтобы она с другими детьми общалась и просто так не сидела без дела. И вот значит смотрю я - сидит она на уроке и вдруг звонит в колокольчик и на большой птице прилетает одноногий ниггир-трап и подмывает Элизабет при всех. Она кучу говиа наложила, представляешь? Кучу говиа. После этого её в башне навсегда и заперли. А тех детей и учителя, что видели как она обосролась закидали до смерти презервативами с водой. А еще Лютесы её один раз вниз головой на неделю подвесили. Я то у них спрашиваю "Но вы же умерли и документы ваши не действительны, вам нельзя тут находится". А Роберт мне такой А МНЕ ПОХУЁ. Я еще тогда подумал, что он сидит на Нульчане. А Элизабет они подвесили ради эксперимента. Сможет ли человек срать через рот? И вроде у них даже это получилось. Только потом пришлось прекратить эксперимент из-за того, что говио в зубах застревало и воняло потом песдец.

Imagine a frag grenade going off in your head... This is how I felt after finishing this masterpiece. This game is one of those that sticks with you well after completing it, with questions of religion, philosphy and the human condition as a whole. Pondering the gullibility of how far we would go to forget or even right our wrongs. But before I lose focus, back to the actual game:

The good:
-Beautifully designed levels/scenery
-Intuitave and creative story
-Smooth gameplay
-Interresting and fun approach to gunplay

The bad:
-Weapon upgrades aren't visual (as it was in Bioshock 1&2)*
*This is the only thing I could find that was negative, and yes, this is scraping at the bottom of the barrel.

Conclusion:
BUY THIS GAME! I would recommend it to gamers of all genres.

Um dos melhores jogos que tive a oportunidade de jogar. Conheci esse jogo através de uma gameplay que assisti no Youtube. Cheguei a torcer o nariz quando vi que uma das protagonistas, a Elizabeth, parecia uma personagem da Disney. Mas não, ela não tem nada a ver com nenhuma princesinha meiga dos contos de fadas. Ela ajuda você o tempó todo e ainda faz com que a gente se interesse ainda mais por ela. Muito carismático todos os personagens principais. Os gráficos são um espetáculo e um presente aos jogadores, não tenho nem palavras pra descrever. É muito bonito!A jogabilidade não é ruim, mas não tão boa se compararmos com alguns jogos de tiro como COD, aliás nem deveria ser, uma vez que também existem algumas outras funções a serem utilizadas, como lançar as magias nos adversários e pedir a ajuda da Elizabeth em alguns obstáculos. Contudo, isso é só uma opinião pessoal que não interfere na qualidade do game. A história é muito, muito boa e o final é O BICHO!! Sério, se estiver muito caro pra você, até aconselho esperar uma promoção. Mas o jogo vale muito a pena. As DLC's são de suma importância pra entendimento do enredo. É como um Epílogo. Pra mim, o melhor Bioshock e um jogo que vai ficar guardado na história dos games. Invista!
All around spectacular experience playing this game, amazing ending aswell, Please for the love of the Flying Spaghetti Moster in the sky (praise he) buy and play this game if you have not already!

ИТОГ : КУПИ ЭТУ ИГРУ И ПРОЙДИ ЕЁ, HOLMES, ОНА ДОСТОЙНА ТОГО, НО НЕ ДРОЧИ НА ЭЛИЗАБЕТ !!!...Она слишком мила для этого

the original game is spectacular. it is a compelling narrative with a mind blowing ending that you can predict if you are really paying attention, but the scope and implications will knock you out of your chair. there are robo-george washingtons.

the graphics and style are effectively cinematography. the scenes that play out are fascinating. the manipulations of reality are brilliant and disorienting. the characters are memorable. i would recommend this game as being one of the greatest artistic/narrative achievements in the history of gaming. anyone who enjoyed half-life 2's campaign will be blown away. fans of 12 monkeys, memento, and other mind fucks will rejoice.

the low point is the raid on the history museum, where the combat is too heavy and the exploration is limited.

buy it, play it loud with surround sound, explore everything, and do it in large chunks.
Addictive!
Argumento, jugabilidad, gráficos, atmósfera... Excelente en todos los apartados. 10/10.
Great FPS has some horror elements in as well beautiful graphics: all round amazing.

Эта игра мне понравилась и поэтому я решил написать на нее обзор.
Итак с самого начала в игре вам предстоит играть никому пока не известным  Букером Девитом,  вам надо найти и доставить в обмен на долги,девушку Элизабет,которая заточена в башне в летающем городе Колумбия.
Как только вы попадаете в Колумбию вашему взору представляется вся красота и необычность города парящего в облаках,
на обилие красок разроботчики точно не скупились, поражают воображение здешние дома среди облаков и жители которые спокойно и беззаботно ходят по улицам города.Также очень необычно для меня было то как здесь преподносится информация о том что было здесь до тебя.О прошлом ты узнаеш благодаря разрывам,кинокамерам и голософонам.
Когда вы находите Элизабет вы понимаете что это не обычная девушка,хотя бы потому,что она сидит в башне и ее охраняет гигантская птица.Позже вы узнаете что она умеет открывать разрывы,то есть порталы в параллельные мир и брать оттуда вещи,которые могли быть в этом мире но их нет.Также помимо разрывов она может открывать двери отмычками и  дает вам деньги патроны и соли,которые всегда нужны.В игре также немаловажную роль играют энергетики,дающие вам особые способности и расходующие соли.
Все эти факторы выстраивают особую систему боя игры,отличающих ее других игр этого жанра.
Но все-таки главной фишкой игры является сюжет,он держит в напряжении до конца игры.  Отдельная победа сценаристов — грандиозный финал. После непростой последней битвы, когда ожидаешь увидеть коротенький итоговый ролик с намеком на продолжение, разработчики выкладывают свой главный козырь — нас еще минут двадцать водят по разным местам и, подобно Морфеусу из «Матрицы», прямым текстом сообщают все, на что раньше лишь намекали. Когда на экране начинают мелькать титры, игрок остается сидеть с трещащей головой и вывихнутой от удивления челюстью просто введет вас в ступор и даст поразмыслить что же произошло.
 Моя оценка 10/10.
I didn't like it much at the start, but later into the game when the story started to kick in, it was fun to play. The ending was shocking too. 8/10
игра стоит своих денег) давно не играл с таким удовольствием и желею что не купил раньше,концовка вообще повергла в шок ) берите вы не пожалеете

Sem dúvidas, um dos, se não o melhor jogo da minha vida. Sem mais. Sem palavras pra descrever a experiência de zerá-lo pela segunda ou terceira vez sem perder o entusiasmo, sem perder a mesma animação de jogar pela primeira vez, simplesmente incrível.

I tried the first Bioshock on Xbox360 not long after it came out. The mechanics were a little strange to me, though I'm no stanger to F{S's, so I put it down and was reluctant to pick it back up. I got BioShock Infinite really cheap and liked the gameplay videos I saw so I decided to give it a try. The mechanics made much more sense than when I played BioShock. The atmoshere was great and the story kept my interest. I'm really glad I finished the game and am looking at picking up the DLC. If you are on the fence about this title, don't be. You're sure to enjoy it.
Increíble, tengo todos los bioshock y este sin duda es el mejor, simplemente es una obra maestra.
Great game, engaging and thrilling story, great looking and detailed world.

It is fascinating, and also boring. It is important, yet forgettable. Its world is enticing and unappealing. It attempts to move things forward, yet is in places stuck in the past. For a game that has the potential to open up the franchise up to a multitude of different ideas and interpretations, BioShock Infinite can feel curiously limited.
fun

Pros: -friendly ai is good and she doesn't get in your way at all not only that but she actually helps you rather than standing in doorways jumping in front of your buletts, and my personal favourite; making you have to revert to a previous save because your friendly NPC died. It is the only example of good friendly ai I have seen. 
-Game runs pretty smoothly overall and I never had to deal with any freezes. 
-No game breaking gliches

Cons: -The story imo was shite 
-I didn't like the rails 
-Very linear 
-Could only carry 2 weapons at a time (despite the ability to carry ammo for guns you didn't have)
 7/10 good but not amazing however was easily worth the 10$ish I spent on the steam sale.
Overrated.
One of the best, if not the best game, of 2013!
Been playing Bioshock since the first one came out, this is by far my favorite. rich graphics, intriguing gameplay, and the storyline was simply amazing.
Лучшая игра в жанре First Person Shooter!!!

Una delle prove inconfutabili che i videogiochi sono una forma d'arte. Rigiocarlo ogni volta è un piacere, ed anche una nuova scoperta.

Unica nota negativa che mi sento di dargli, è che paragonandolo ad altri FPS, specialmente ai giorni d'oggi, l'avere solo due armi alla volta è poco efficiente da un punto di vista "creativo" (dal momento che puoi usare un totale di [spoiler] 8 [/spoiler] vigor differenti, potenziarli e potenziare tutte le armi del gioco, può risultare un po' banale usare solamente 2 armi alla volta, o almeno questo è ciò che ho provato io rigiocandolo nel 2020)

Nonostante ciò, questo gioco è Arte: La trama, la grafica, la musica e l'intero comparto sonoro. Uno di quelli da acquistare senza indugi, ed un acquisto che non porterà alcun rimorso, se non quello di non averlo giocato già anni fa.

Ah ed Elizabeth che viola le leggi della fisica lanciandoti munizioni da dietro le pareti è ancora oggi 10/10, come il voto che merita il gioco.

Made me doubt my existance...

10/10

От старого Биошока мало что осталось... Мягко-ванильная игра с минимумом ужаса и крови. Слегка жутковато становится лишь к концу игры. Финал вообще полный бред наркомана или шизофреника, мало логичен.
Единственный полезный тоник - электричество. Главный персонаж слишком уж нервный, вечно ударяет рукой по кнопкам и говорит загадками, видимо паранойя.

В плюсы могу записать хорошее музыкальное сопровождение.
This is a great game, all who enjoy first person shooters and action games should get it. Some issues with the game like THE CRUSHINGLY HARD HANDYMEN!

De los mejores juegos que he jugado en mi vida. Los gráficos te atraen, pero la historia te engancha. Una obra maestra que sigue los pasos de sus predecesores (Bioshock 1 y 2) desde el principio hasta el final.

10/10

Excellent game with one of the best stories ive ever played. 10/10

Okay, I was very excited for this game.  Loved the first and second.  This game on the other hand was a total let down.  The powers/plasmids/vigors are complete shit in this game, just load up the birds, and bucking bronco.  There is no ice to melt to find stuff, like 3 puddles to shock people, and about the same for oil spills.  Instead of hacking they give you a power to take over units for a short time which is kinda cheep feeling.  The guns have no originality as they did in the first two especally when you could start upgrading them.  No speical ammo, no creative ways to setup traps.  I do not understand how the game got such great reviews.

4/10 at best

Como debe ser un shoot'em up en primer persona, complementado con una fascinante y retorcida historia. Bioshock Infinite es además divertido, el argumento te anima a seguir avanzando sin descanso entre las calles y mansiones de una ciudad celestial (en el sentido literal) y el final sin duda es lo mejor del juego. Sin duda recomiendo su compra.
Amazing game with an intricate and meaningful story. The gameplay was fast-paced and fun. If you haven't picked this game up yet, you're missing out.

The core gameplay is much better than the previous bioshock games, with less tediium (no hacking minigames, no stupidly low max-ammo/max-money, plenty of places to restore health/mana).  So that's a plus.

However, the ending is incredibly bad. There's some "meh, really?" parts in the middle that I was willing to overlook, but the last  10 minutes or so are terrible.  Not only is it deeply unsatisfying, it also feels like writer masturbation.   Ugh.
Elizabeth is hot...
awesome game

Excellent game fun, good story better than I expected actually as I never played a BioShock game before.  Excellent graphics, story keeps moving so you don't get bored and it has some twist I really didn't expect.  Highly recommend playing if you havent playing this series yet.
wonderful story and gameplay, one of the best games ive played in a while

This is probably one of the finest games that 2k games has to offer. It's simply a master piece, I've played it a lot of times on ps3, and then In pc I can say there is no much difference from the console version, only for the ultra quiality textures, but either you play it on ultra or very low you will be getting the full experience from the main story, which is very well writen, It makes you think about it for days, even for weeks, I've played the other 2 bioshock titles, but this one is off the chain. If you haven't played it yet you should, It won't disappoint you, as I previously mention, The story is just amazing! one of my favorite games of all time!
